thread.title: No More Phone Tag Provides Flat-Rate, Apartment, and Medical Answering Services | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
thread.title_full: No More Phone Tag Provides Flat-Rate, Apartment, and Medical Answering Services | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: No More Phone Tag Provides Flat-Rate, Apartment, and Medical Answering Services | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: Easy flow of communication is crucial when handling the requirements of clients, customers, or patients. Through trusted call-answering solutions, service providers can respond to different needs seamlessly. No More Phone Tag is a leading automated call answering system providing trusted solutions that help service providers communicate with their clients and vice versa. The system offers service providers an easy medium to engage clients and customers better. Walter Lundstrom built an automated call answering system for service providers from various fields. Their services are offered to doctors, pediatricians, property management companies, physicians, healthcare services, OBGYNS, and medical offices. In response to a query about their services, a spokesperson of No More Phone Tag commented, “Businesses and establishments must be reachable and responsive, as their customers can require emergency services. We are here to make this easily achievable through our call-answering system. With over 30 years in the industry, we have been providing small & large businesses, organizations, and private offices with trusted answering services. By paying close attention to the needs of our clients, we continue to improve our solutions. We also ensure that we have no missed or inaccurately routed calls, which cause many problems for clients, especially in a life-and-death situation. We are a client-focused answering service company, and we put our clients' messages first, providing them with 24/7 answering services.” No More Phone Tag offers standard call answering services. The client-centric call answering service has reliable resources to handle over 600,000 calls monthly. They charge their customers a flat rate, as they do not want them to put their patients at risk because they cannot afford their call answering services. There are no hidden costs and setup fees. Their customers can make unlimited calls at a flat rate of $69. Based on their experience in the property management field, they also know how to separate urgent maintenance calls from less urgent ones, and if their customer's technical team cannot answer, they will escalate immediately. Therefore, those interested in this flat - rate answering services pricing can visit their website for more details. The spokesperson added, “We recognize how difficult it can get to manage an apartment. Our apartment answering service is designed to make your job easier, providing an easy means to communicate with tenants to resolve several problems. Medical professionals can also attend to patients promptly and effectively through our doctor's answering services. We have practical and economical solutions ideal for your medical office.” No More Phone Tag offers a free 14-day trial of its call-answering services. People who want to know their apartment answering service costs can visit their website. About No More Phone Tag No More Phone Tag is a reliable answering service provider. Those who want to enlist the best medical answering services can consider them. Contact Information: No More Phone Tag. 635 Park Meadow Rd., Suite 105, Westerville, OH 43081 Phone: (614) 895-2820 Website: https://www.nomorephonetag.com/ Media Contact Company Name: No More Phone Tag, Inc. Contact Person: Walter Lundstrom Email: Send Email Phone: 614-895-2820 Address:635 Park Meadow Rd. suite 105 City: Westerville State: Ohio 43081 Country: United States Website: https://www.nomorephonetag.com/
